column5: He got hydro and phone back late this afternoon so all is good there. I am still going over Sunday to get that tree off his shed for him so if anyone can give me a hand it would be appreciated! Anyone else need a generator?
Thanks for the heads up cliff, I'll pass that on to my brother in hopes he can make it to help you out as I really can't afford to take the day off if I can help it.  Maureen

DANG!!!...I thought I might have spoken too soon as the lights went out again at 09:00pm last night but thanks to whoever or whatever they were back on a half hour later...(PHEW***)  I spoke to my step-son Michael and told him to come around 10:00am on Sunday...Is that good with you Cliff ?

I might be a little later than that Beans, probably not until about noon, got to help another friend in the morning and just put in a day of hard labour around here. Might sleep in for a bit if I can.
